title: For Sale: T206 Leifield "Partial G on Uniform"

posts.post_title: For Sale: T206 Leifield "Partial G on Uniform"
posts.post_content:
It's only a matter of time before this one is recognized in SCD!
Think about it, Shappe, Dopner, Mitchell Toront and Murr'y all got in!

This is the second example I've seen. (Reference: [URL="http://www.net54baseball.com/showpost.php?p=792517&postcount=10"]Click Here[/URL])

The scan very accurately depicts this VG-EX card.
(Take note of very light wrinkle above and right of "The")

$139

PayPal ('Payment Owed' or add 3%), or USPS Money Order preferred.

Email: [url]trae@t206.org[/url] (PM fine also)
